Detailed Description

Trajectory implementation for storing track info for persistence and visualization.

Note:
Class is based on this Geant4 tip: Trajectory Event Tip

Definition at line 32 of file Trajectory.h.

ldmx::Trajectory::Trajectory ( const G4Track *  aTrack  ) 

Class constructor.

Parameters:
aTrack The Track from which to construct the trajectory.

Definition at line 14 of file Trajectory.cxx.

References energy_, ldmx::UserTrackInformation::getInitialMomentum(), globalTime_, initialMomentum_, mass_, parentID_, particleDef_, processType_, trackID_, trajPoints_, and vertexPosition_.

00014                                                 :
00015             genStatus_(0) {
00016 
00017         // Copy basic info from the track.
00018         particleDef_ = aTrack->GetDefinition();
00019         mass_ = aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetMass();
00020         trackID_ = aTrack->GetTrackID();
00021         parentID_ = aTrack->GetParentID();
00022         globalTime_ = aTrack->GetGlobalTime();
00023         vertexPosition_ = aTrack->GetVertexPosition();
00024         energy_ = aTrack->GetVertexKineticEnergy() + mass_;
00025 
00026         // Get the creator process type.  The sub-type must be used here to get
00027         // the type for a specific physics process like photonuclear.
00028         const G4VProcess* process = aTrack->GetCreatorProcess();
00029         if (process) {
00030             processType_ = process->GetProcessSubType();
00031         }
00032 
00033         // Set initial momentum from track information.
00034         UserTrackInformation* trackInfo = dynamic_cast<UserTrackInformation*>(aTrack->GetUserInformation());
00035         const G4ThreeVector& p = trackInfo->getInitialMomentum();
00036         initialMomentum_.set(p.x(), p.y(), p.z());
00037 
00038         // If the track has not been stepped, then only the first point is added.
00039         // Otherwise, the track has already been stepped so we add also its last location
00040         // which should be its endpoint.
00041         trajPoints_ = new TrajectoryPointContainer();
00042         trajPoints_->push_back(new G4TrajectoryPoint(aTrack->GetVertexPosition()));
00043         if (aTrack->GetTrackStatus() == G4TrackStatus::fStopAndKill) {
00044             trajPoints_->push_back(new G4TrajectoryPoint(aTrack->GetPosition()));
00045         }
00046     }

Parameters:

Definition at line 94 of file Trajectory.cxx.

00095         if (secondTrajectory == NULL) {
00096             return;
00097         }
00098 
00099         Trajectory* seco = (Trajectory*) secondTrajectory;
00100         G4int ent = seco->GetPointEntries();

00102             trajPoints_->push_back((*(seco->trajPoints_))[i]);
00103         }

00105         seco->trajPoints_->clear();
